channel.title: Teleporting
channel.description: how would i add a Temeport Tab With Different Locations? like when you click a teleport aka (monsters) then a list come's down with monsters?

item.title: Teleporting
item.dc:creator: @lineage lineage
item.description:
@lineage wrote:

nope i never had the method i have just added it in (Dialog handler and i have added the case 4140: c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.LUMBY_X, Config.LUMBY_Y, 0, "modern"); c.getDH().sendOption5("Rock Crabs", "Dungeon Teleport", "Slayer Tower", "Strykewyrm Teleport", "More Coming Soon..."); c.teleAction = 1; break;

but now how do i do it so i can get 4 Teleport’s on that thing as if i try adding teleport’s i get error’s? and now i have done that they dont teleport anywere atall so what im saying is where do i add the coord’s linking to this tab? like (rock crabs? coords?)

item.title: Teleporting
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

send x amount of strings.

our void for the four strings:

public static void sendOption4(Client c, String s, String s1, String s2, String s3) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2481); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s, 2482); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 2483); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 2484); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s3, 2485); c.getPA().sendFrame164(2480); }

now to send/use them:

sendOption4(c, "string 1", "string 2", "string 3", "string 4");

now create a dialogue action and put the string(s) in the dialogue action. then call the dialogue action underneath the case of the item id.

Read full topic

You request an interface and then you replace the text on your interface and set the buttons on the interface as teleports
